Class FoodItem

java.lang.Object
classes.FoodItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Item
Direct Known Subclasses:
Carrot, Fish, Shrimp
public class FoodItem extends Object implements Item
Food Item parent object.

The food item class provides a general format for each of the food item subclasses (Shrimp, Carrot and Fish). It has variables price, quantity, sharkEffective, pufferEffective and axolEffective which are useful for all subclasses.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Cadence Megan McGillicuddy

  • Constructor Details

    • FoodItem

      public FoodItem(int sharkEffective, int pufferEffective, int axolEffective, int quantity)
      Food item constructor. Creates a new food item.
      Parameters:
      sharkEffective - the effectiveness the respective food item has on a shark pet
      pufferEffective - the effectiveness the respective food item has on a pufferfish pet
      axolEffective - the effectiveness the respective food item has on an axolotl pet
      quantity - the quantity of the item in the player inventory

  • Method Details

    • getQuantity

      public int getQuantity()
      Retrieves the quantity of the item the player currently has in their inventory.
      Returns:
      an integer representing the quantity of the item.

    • useItem

      public void useItem()
      Called when the player uses an item. Subtracts one from the item's quantity.
      Specified by:
      useItem in interface Item

    • buyItem

      public void buyItem()
      Called when the player buys an item from the shop. Adds one to the item's quantity.
      Specified by:
      buyItem in interface Item
